entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as the one who claims that the horn was from a Crumple-Horned Snorkack. She also talks to Mr. Ollivander and says goodbye to him.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who tries to correct Luna's mistake about the horn. She also lays down forks while talking to Bill and Mr. Ollivander.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as the one who appears with Mr. Ollivander, supporting him and carrying a large suitcase. He also has an Auntie Muriel who needs a package delivered.

entities.name: mr ollivander
entities.description: Mr. Ollivander is mentioned as the wandmaker who looks frail and is being supported by Bill. He also talks to Luna, Fleur, and says goodbye to them.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as the one who kisses Mr. Ollivander on both cheeks and asks him to deliver a package to Bill's Auntie Muriel.

entities.name: crumple-horned snorkack
entities.description: The Crumple-Horned Snorkack is mentioned as the animal that Luna claims the horn came from. It is also contrasted with the Erumpent.

entities.name: erumpent
entities.description: The Erumpent is mentioned as the animal that Hermione says the horn actually came from, not a Crumple-Horned Snorkack.

entities.name: auntie muriel
entities.description: Auntie Muriel is mentioned as Bill's aunt who needs a package delivered by Mr. Ollivander.

relationships.description: Luna claims that the horn came from a Crumple-Horned Snorkack.
Hermione says that the horn actually came from an Erumpent, not a Crumple-Horned Snorkack.
Luna says goodbye to Mr. Ollivander.
Fleur kisses Mr. Ollivander on both cheeks.
Fleur asks Mr. Ollivander to deliver a package to Bill's Auntie Muriel.
Mr. Ollivander agrees to deliver a package to Bill's Auntie Muriel.
